Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Where did price / quality go wrong? eur 4,30 for a medium cappuccino. Maybe this is the new normal with 7% consumer inflation.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Although 3,80 for a crema/americano is quite expensive, it was REALLY good. Mild though strong enough to kick off your day. Friendly staff and newspapers to read for free. Definiteley recommended!!!

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Wonderful friendly staff, nice place and fantastic coffee. I would for sure recommend it and go again when I'm around!

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Through winter and summer we love the Coffee Company on Kinkerstraat for an Iced Hazelnut Latte with oatmilk. Super friendly and efficient staff and you always get the quality you expect. üêñ

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Had a nice cup of coffee here and the baristas were very friendly

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text:
This is the second Coffee Company I have been too since moving to Amsterdam. I am super impressed that the quality of coffee and service is not a one off.
The coffee is silky smooth and it's a waste buying any thing smaller that a ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Cozy quiet place to work a little in the morning.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: The sizes are bit disappointing. Don't go for a small unless you want one sip of coffee. Otherwise good coffee and pastry options.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Great place to do work despite it being fairly busy. There is a quiet back room with plugs and space to spread out. The menu has pretty much everything and the caramel cappuccino is delicious! A little expensive however.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: First of all, really slow service. You have to stand up at least 10 minutes to get a regular coffee. Most of the time they are out of food such as yoghurt, croissant etc. so do not go there with empty belly. According to my experience, wifi ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Staff here is superinvolved - with their friends. The coffee dude took his sweet time to make a weak, lukewarm cappuccino with a lovely heart decoration. Except I'm not a cutesy girl who is into that. I apprecaite the precision and ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Place was lovely. Now renewed. No posters in the walls, music now is a little louder, brighter and removed some of the sprinkle options. Only good change was the bathroom.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Got coffee to go, I enjoy my americano but my partner said her vanilla latte was too sweet but it was decently priced and didn't have to wait long for our order.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Delicious coffee to go! Great selection of different types of milk, chai and matcha.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Great coffee, great staff, great location! Get your coffee from this place. Also to go!

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Surprisingly spacious yet cosy. Great coffee options and friendly staff  Perfect olace to get some work or relaxing done.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Nice outside seating, with good basic coffee (love the flat white)!!

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Love the setup and Staff were super helpful

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Good coffee, hope they will reopen indoors soon im exited

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Very slow. Not worth going there in the morning as it takes at least 10 minutes to get a take away coffee every time.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Solid chain of coffeeshops with light food menu and free wifi. Rather spend money here vs Starbucks any day.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Real good coffee and a great attendance

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Good coffee and friendly staff. A bit crowded at times but still a nice and cozy place to study.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Frozen cappuccino is very good!

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Friendly staff, nice setup and not to forget, good coffee.

Name: Coffee Company

Name: Coffee Company

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Staff is okay, coffee is good, but its always too hot in the back.

Review Text: (Translated by Google) I was a regular customer here. Unfortunately a number of times lately a very bad experience with the staff. It really depends on who works there. But there are some people who are very rude and just bully you away. ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Compared to Spain, prices are a little higher (3.5e for a medium cut and 2.70 for a small one). The place is very nice and the workers are friendly. Beautiful place to have a coffee overlooking the street. ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Can get very busy at times but it's a nice place to have a coffee with a sandwich while you're on your laptop. Coffee is good, staff very friendly. Wifi is moderate and it is quite warm in the summer, especially in ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Bought a biscuit today (Monday) with a shelf-life Lebel packaged on Tuesday and gone on Thursday .. the biscuit is not as soft as normal so it probably should have been thrown away last Thursday, a waste of money! ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Slightly better ventilation would not be a problem. Space is small but design and furniture makes it even smaller. Most important coffee is many times tastier than Starbucks. ‚Ä¶
